snippet.title: Axe Ghost - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
In Axe Ghost you play cards to battle an advancing monster horde in turn-based spatial combat. Manipulate enemy positions, group monsters for high scores, and face off against the loathsome Garnemar!

Play the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2712670/Axe_Ghost/
